channel.title: Massacred World, The ULTIMATE In Pk RSPS
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/33ku2kp.png[/img]
Welcome to [B]Massacred World[/B], the ultimate PK'ing server with a difference.
Massacred World is the ONLY unique server to have a 100% PvP world, perfect dfs operating options and perfect combat. Not only this, but we have randomised pvp drops (as well as your normal kill) and PvP tasks; which are collected from vannaka.
PvP tasks are given for you to kill main accounts, zerkers or pures. If you kill someone for your task; you recieve double points. And to make sure this is as easy as possible, you can change your stats to any amount; at any time!
[IMG]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/695/trainingx.png[/img]
Our training system is designed to be instant, so you can get right to what you want to do. Enjoy the freedom of becoming a zerker, main or pure in the blink of an eye.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/fnb51.gif[/img]
Our client is a clean and fresh version that includes a jframe border, all of runescapes new animations, graphics and npcs and thousands of new weapons for you to use and PK with.
[IMG]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/2108/servervis.png[/img]
Our users love making pking vids for the server, at the moment you can check out this quick walk through.
[U][B]Server Vid:[/B] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LJM-C8BaX5c
Check this out if you want a more detailed run of the server!
[IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/3205/serverpics.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/4114/image6fk.png[/img] [IMG]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/4613/image9q.png[/img] [IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/4555/image10at.png[/img] [IMG]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/3657/image7ss.png[/img] [IMG]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/1342/image8n.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/11av1c7.png[/img]
If your looking for a server with a perfect combat system, this is your chance. All timers, specials and projectiles are perfect in sync with runescape, if you want to test this out; you will not regret it.
[IMG]http://img714.imageshack.us/img714/4484/ddsv.png[/img] [IMG]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/8452/dmace.png[/img] [IMG]http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/3848/dlong.png[/img] [IMG]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/5094/gmaulz.png[/img] [IMG]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/5003/agsw.png[/img] [IMG]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/5395/sgsys.png[/img] [IMG]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/8053/bgskp.png[/img] [IMG]http://img178.imageshack.us/img178/5519/97869201.png[/img] [IMG]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/4563/zgs.png[/img]
We are [B]the ultimate PK'ing sensation[/B]. If you want to train your skills, or just kick some ass, come to us.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/295rdxj.gif[/img]
[U]Post suggestions here![/U][/center]

shardyboy:

nice demise btw id like to ask you a question im coding a pvp server you may see it its called Greldor, and im trying to figure out how to make safezones dude. Cant find it anywhere. Bit of help pal?

Yh. IsInPvP

item.title: Massacred World, The ULTIMATE In Pk RSPS
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

shardyboy:

nice demise btw id like to ask you a question im coding a pvp server you may see it its called Greldor, and im trying to figure out how to make safezones dude. Cant find it anywhere. Bit of help pal?

If you are using a Cammy-PvP base then the safezone boolean is called “IsInPvP” just add the coords to that.

item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[center]

33ku2kp.png700×200

Welcome to Massacred World, the ultimate PK’ing server with a difference.

Massacred World is the ONLY unique server to have a 100% PvP world, perfect dfs operating options and perfect combat. Not only this, but we have randomised pvp drops (as well as your normal kill) and PvP tasks; which are collected from vannaka.

PvP tasks are given for you to kill main accounts, zerkers or pures. If you kill someone for your task; you recieve double points. And to make sure this is as easy as possible, you can change your stats to any amount; at any time!

Our training system is designed to be instant, so you can get right to what you want to do. Enjoy the freedom of becoming a zerker, main or pure in the blink of an eye.

Our client is a clean and fresh version that includes a jframe border, all of runescapes new animations, graphics and npcs and thousands of new weapons for you to use and PK with.

Our users love making pking vids for the server, at the moment you can check out this quick walk through.

[U]Server Vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LJM-C8BaX5c

Check this out if you want a more detailed run of the server!





If your looking for a server with a perfect combat system, this is your chance. All timers, specials and projectiles are perfect in sync with runescape, if you want to test this out; you will not regret it.









We are the ultimate PK’ing sensation. If you want to train your skills, or just kick some ass, come to us.

Post suggestions here![/center]
